item.title: CV
item.author: blut.hannes@gmail.com (Hannes Blut)
item.description: Experience IT Infrastructure Consultant at Accenture GmbH (May 2017 - present) Concept, design, and implementation lead of a standardized CI/CD pipeline for a DevOps project Aligning infrastructure developments and application production readiness across multiple teams in an agile environment Design and implementation lead of automated permission and access management in Kubernetes and HashiCorp Vault Monitoring, optimizing, and validating AWS costs and changes IT infrastructure monitoring and controlling Program planning for the implementation of techincal and operative optimizations Supporting role in an IT operating model assessment and subsequent definition of a target operating model IT Operations Support at Max-Planck-Institute for Non-linear Dynamics and Self-Organisation (2015 - Feb 2017)
